description: This file 'ssp_global.h' appears to be a header file for a C/C++ project. It primarily contains include directives, macro definitions, license information, and function declarations related to the 'MeshAgent' component and general SSP global configurations. It does not contain implementations or class definitions, but sets up external references and declares functions to be used elsewhere in the source code.
